text: The Tour of Tasmania is a cycling road race contested annually in Tasmania, Australia. Created in 1996, the race formed part of the calendar of the Union Cycliste International from 1997 to 2002. The race was not contested the 2001, 2003 and 2004, it reappeared in 2005, but was not integrated with the UCI Oceania Tour. The 2018 edition of the race was won by Dylan Sunderland of Bennelong SwissWellness Cycling Team p/b Cervelo. There have been several different previously-contested races since 1930, antecedents of the current Tour of Tasmania. == Winners == ===Original Tour of Tasmania=== * 1930 Hubert Opperman * 1933 Richard Lamb * 1934 Richard Lamb ===The Mercury Tour of Tasmania=== {| border="0" id="cx107" width="72%" data-source="107" data-cx- state="mt" data-cx-weight="212" style="margin-bottom: 10px;" contenteditable="true" | align="left" id="110" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1954 Reginald Arnold * 1955 * 1956 Eddie Smith * 1957 Russell Mockridge | align="left" id="124" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1958 Peter Panton * 1959 Peter Panton * 1960 John O'Sullivan * 1961 Ronald Murray | align="left" id="138" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1962 Ronald Murray * 1963 Peter Panton |} ===The Examiner Tour of the North=== {| border="0" id="cx148" width="72%" data-source="148" data-cx-state="mt" data-cx-weight="733" style="margin- bottom: 10px;" contenteditable="true" | align="left" id="151" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1954 Colin McKay * 1955 Neil Geraghty * 1956 Jim Nevin * 1957–1959 no contested * 1960 Colin Hymus * 1961 Allan Grindal * 1962 Vic Brown * 1963 Vic Brown * 1964 Malcolm Powell * 1965 Ray Bilney * 1966 Don Wilson * 1967 | align="left" id="188" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1968 Kevin Morgan * 1969 Kerry Wood * 1970 Donald Allan * 1971 Russell Tankard * 1972 Donald Allan * 1973 * 1974 Remo Sansonetti * 1975 Remo Sansonetti * 1976 Remo Sansonetti * 1977 Gary Sutton * 1978 Michael Wilson * 1979 John Trevorrow | align="left" valign="top" width="24%" | * 1980 Geoff Skaines * 1981 Murray Hall * 1982 Wayne Dellar * 1983 Wayne Hildred * 1984 * 1985 Michael Lynch * 1986 Stephen Hodge * 1987 Barney St. George * 1988 Kevetoslav Pavlov * 1989 No contested * 1990 * 1991 Grant Rice |} ===Current Tour Of Tasmania=== {| class="wikitable sortable" id="cx265" data-source="265" data-cx-weight="972" contenteditable="true" !
